body:
Fixes #16725
The dap, jna, pnetcdf, netcdf4, and ncgen4 variants added in #16047
and specifically their associated configure flags --enable-dap, --enable-jna,
--enable-pnetcdf, --enable-netcdf-4, --enable-ncgen4 are _not_ supported
by the configure script for netcdf-cxx4 package (These appear to be
configure args for netcdf-c package).
title: netcdf-cxx4: Remove erroneous variants added in #16047/commit 993491c
